articles.title: Human Immunity Pushing Back on COVID As New Variant Arises - WebMD
articles.description: The coronavirus is constantly mutating to survive the growing antibody pushback it encounters as our bodies learn how to fight it. COVID's newest variant is an offshoot of BA.2.86 called JN.1.

articles.title: Common chemotherapy drugs don't work like doctors thought, with big implications for drug discovery - Medical Xpress
